recommendations.title: Low-Impact Energy Boost
recommendations.description: Perfect for day 15 of your cycle

yoga.title: Morning Yoga Flow
yoga.description: A gentle yoga flow to start your day with energy and focus

exercises.name: Sun Salutation
exercises.description: A flowing sequence of movements coordinated with breath
exercises.tips: Move with your breath, inhale on upward movements, exhale on downward movements.

exercises.name: Warrior I
exercises.description: A standing pose that strengthens the legs and opens the hips and chest
exercises.tips: Keep your front knee aligned with your ankle, not beyond your toes.

exercises.name: Downward Dog
exercises.description: An inversion pose that stretches the hamstrings and strengthens the arms
exercises.tips: Press your heels toward the floor and lift your hips high.

exercises.name: Child's Pose
exercises.description: A resting pose that gently stretches the lower back and hips
exercises.tips: Breathe deeply and relax your shoulders away from your ears.

yoga.title: Relaxing Stretch
yoga.description: A gentle stretching routine to release tension and improve flexibility

exercises.name: Seated Forward Bend
exercises.description: A seated pose that stretches the hamstrings and lower back
exercises.tips: Bend from the hips, not the waist, and keep your spine long.

exercises.name: Butterfly Stretch
exercises.description: A seated pose that opens the hips and stretches the inner thighs
exercises.tips: Gently press your knees down with your elbows, but don't force them.

exercises.name: Supine Twist
exercises.description: A lying pose that twists the spine and releases tension
exercises.tips: Keep both shoulders on the ground as you twist.

exercises.name: Corpse Pose
exercises.description: A relaxation pose that calms the mind and body
exercises.tips: Let your body be heavy and completely relax into the floor.

hiit.title: Quick Burn HIIT
hiit.description: A high-intensity interval training workout to maximize calorie burn

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description: Stand with your feet together and arms at your sides, then jump up with your feet apart and hands overhead.
exercises.tips: Keep your knees slightly bent to reduce impact.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: Start in a plank position and alternate bringing each knee toward your chest in a running motion.
exercises.tips: Keep your hips level and move at a controlled pace.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: Begin in a standing position, drop into a squat, kick your feet back into a plank, return to squat, and jump up.
exercises.tips: Modify by stepping back instead of jumping if needed.

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.description: Run in place, lifting your knees as high as possible with each step.
exercises.tips: Engage your core and pump your arms for added intensity.

strength.title: Core Strength
strength.description: A focused workout to strengthen your core muscles

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.description: Lie on your back with knees bent, hands behind your head, and lift your shoulders off the ground.
exercises.tips: Focus on the contraction of your abs, not pulling on your neck.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Hold a push-up position with your body in a straight line from head to heels.
exercises.tips: Engage your core and keep your hips from sagging.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.description: Sit with knees bent, feet lifted, and twist your torso from side to side.
exercises.tips: Keep your back straight and twist from your waist.

exercises.name: Leg Raises
exercises.description: Lie on your back and lift your legs up and down without touching the floor.
exercises.tips: Press your lower back into the floor to protect your spine.

achievements.title: 5-Day Streak
achievements.description: Completed workouts 5 days in a row
